description: Europol is proposing solutions to avoid challenges posed by privacy-enhancing technologies in Home Routing that hinder law enforcement's ability to intercept communications during criminal investigations. [...]
title: Europol says Home Routing mobile encryption feature aids criminals

description: E-commerce platform Shopify denies it suffered a data breach after a threat actor began selling customer data they claim was stolen from the company's network. [...]
title: Shopify denies it was hacked, links stolen data to third-party app
